title: B1 Support looking for 5's team
body:
Bronze 1 almost Silver 5 looking for a team. I am happy to play jungle also despite not have a massive pool of champs as a jungler.
Just add me for a chat or just comment and ill get back to you

replies.body:
Hey i was looking at the feed and notice you are the only B1 player looking for a team which is great for me cause i'm B3, recently got demoted :(, anyway i would enjoy playing with some new people. i play any lane but i'm great in jg, top and supp
My mains are {{champion:86}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:11}}  and have seen myself play {{champion:90}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:45}}  for some time
